Follow-Up
Malagasy English
1. Avy nisy olona naty tao antokantranonao letra fotoana farany namangy anao zahay? (Asiana info aminy Open Census raha Eny) 1. Have there been any deaths in your household since our last visit? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
2. Avy nisy zaza teraka vao letra fotoana farany namangy anao zahay? (Raha "Eny," asiana aminy Open Census) 2. Have there been any births in your household since our last visit? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
3. Taiza niteraka ve ianao? 3. Where did the delivery take place? *
... Antrano Tranon'ny mpananava CSB Hopitaly Be Maroa Hafa
Antrano Home Tranon'ny mpananava Mpanavana's home CSB Clinic Hopitaly Be Maroa Hospital Maroa Hafa Other
This field is required
3a. Hafa 3a. Other *
This field is required
4. Bevotroka ve ianao taminy volana lasa? 4. Were you pregnant last month? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
5. Bevotroka ve ianao aminy andro izao? 5. Are you pregnant now? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
ANC ANC
A1. Oviana fotoana farany nandeha fotoana ve ianao? A1. When was the date of your last menstration? *
Daty farany nandeha fotoana ianao Exact LMP date
Fotoana farany nandeha fotoana ianao (volana-taona) LMP in month-year
This field is required
- A1a. Exact LMP date *
This field is required
- A1b. LMP in mont-year *
This field is required
A2. Impiry avy nandeha namangy dokotera ve ianao letra fotoana fantatrao ka bevotraka? A2. How many prenatal visits have you had during your pregnancy? *
Value not allowed This field is required
A3. Mihinana karazana fanafody satria bevotraka ve ianao? A3. Have you begun taking any prenatal medications? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
A4. Inona no anarany karazana aody? A4. What is the name(s) for your medication(s)? *
This field is required
A5. Nandeha rà anatiny kindy taminy volana lasa? A5. Have you experienced vaginal bleeding during pregnancy? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
A6. Raha eny, nandeha rà be sa hely? A6. If yes, how severe has you vaginal bleeding been? *
Be Mild bleeding
Hely Heavy bleeding
This field is required
A7. Nitsabo tena ve ianao taminy fandehan'ny rà tao anatiny kindy? A7. Have you sought treatment for you vaginal bleeding? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
6. Raha bevotroka taminy volana lasa fa tsy izao, avy nisy hafa-zaza na zaza tsy azo? 6. If pregnant last month and not now, was there a miscarriage or stillbirth? *
Hafa-zaza Miscarriage
Zaza tsy azo Stillbirth
Niteraka zaza velogno Live birth
This field is required
7. Mampiasa pilina fisakanana fisian'ny vohoka atao hoe Pilplan na karazana epicure? 7. Are you taking any form of contraception? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
8. Inona karazana fisakanana fisian'ny vohoka ampiasainao? Pilina? Epicura? Kapaoty? Hafa? 8. What type of contraception are you taking? *
... Pilina Epicura Kapaoty Hafa
Pilina Pill Epicura Shot Kapaoty IUD Hafa Condoms
This field is required
9. Mampinona ve ianao amin'ny andro izao? 9. Are you currently breastfeeding? *
Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required
10. Efa nanomboka nihinana sakafo ivelany nono zanakanao? 10. Are you no longer exclusively breastfeeding? *

Tsia No
This field is required

Eny Yes
Tsia No
This field is required

- 0 - 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 - 5 - 6 - 7
